law.catch_line: Taking game with a firearm during bow season prohibited.

text.section: Except as provided in this section, no person shall knowingly take game with a firearm during bow season.

This section shall not apply to a person who:
Uses a firearm permitted by law to take game permitted by law to be taken during bow season; or
Kills, attempts to kill, wounds, or attempts to wound an animal in self-defense, in defense of another person, or in defense of property, or as provided in KRS 150.172.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010.
